[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-2″ pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646656298548{padding-top: 160px !important;background-color: #2f529e !important;}” fade_in_intro=”20″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-150px“}”][vc_column width=”7/12″ css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”33788″ img_size=”full” css=”.vc_custom_1646635224759{margin-top: 60px !important;}”]
Digital Marketing Course In Delhi

Digiperform Offers Best Digital Marketing Course in Delhi. Aimed For Freshers, Working Professionals, & Business Owners with Latest Curriculum, 100% Practical Exposure and Live-Assignments.

321+ Hours Program 50+ Digital Marketing Modules 15+ Specialized Certificates

[vc_empty_space height=”25px”] BOOK A FREE DEMO[vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″]
100% Job Assistance Award Winning LMS Tool based learning
DOWNLOAD BROCHURE NOW

Trained more than 30,000+ Students

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” fade_in_opacity=”pix-opacity-2″ pix_over_visibility=”” pix_overlay_color=”white” css=”.vc_custom_1646654294688{margin-bottom: -60px !important;padding-top: 110px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” fade_in_intro=”20″ b_custom_height=”50px”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
    Centre Overview

    About: Digital Marketing Institute In Delhi

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646125373661{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1589595508057{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

    We have 4 centers available in Delhi, which are located in- Kailash Colony, Pitampura, Rajouri, and Connaught Place. And through these modernly designed Knowledge centers in Delhi, we Offer State-of-the-art Digital Marketing Classrooms with modern furniture, Learning aids and combined capacity to train 70 Students at a time.

    Anyone can join our Live-Classroom Digital Marketing Training and upgrade their digital marketing skills by getting one of the most valuable certifications in the Industry.

    [vc_empty_space height=”5px”] DOWNLOAD BROCHURE[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”20″ t_2_is_gradient=”true” t_2_color=”#e6f3f7″ t_3_is_gradient=”true” t_3_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” t_3_color_2=”#f7f7f7″ css=”.vc_custom_1646128570120{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646656510734{margin-top: 180px !important;}”][vc_column]

    The Advanced Digital Marketing Training Program in Delhi is Best For

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646129529161{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”]

    Who can join Digital Marketing Course in Delhi?

    [vc_column_text]The training program is perfectly designed to cover every single element in the digital marketing domain and suitable of everyone, whether a Job Seeker, Entrepreneur, Working Professional or Business Owner. This Program is designed meticulously to provide a great learning experience to aspirants and help them to develop their digital skills to initiate a successful career in the digital marketing domain.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
    • Jobseeker looking for a bright career option.
    • Graduates who are looking for their first job.
    • Professionals who want to enhance their skills.
    • Professionals looking for a Career Change.
    • Small Business Owners who don’t want to stay small.
    • Entrepreneurs who desire to be more entrepreneurial.
    • Gain a Professional Certification in Digital Marketing.
    [/vc_column_text] YES! BOOK MY FREE DEMO[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”33713″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1646130241326{margin-top: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646131552582{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”40px”]
    Trusted by over 100+ of the World’s Leading Companies

    13,300+ Students Got their 1st Job; With Digiperform Certifications & Over 9000+ Trainees Got Better Salary Hike.

    [vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”33718″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”33715″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”33720″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”33733″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”33719″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_single_image image=”33717″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647416280045{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

    Why Digiperform is Leader in Digital Marketing Training?

    Digiperform is Asia’s Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column width=”1/4″]

    0+

    BATCHES

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

    0

    CENTERS

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

    0+

    TRAINED

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]

    0+

    PLACEMENTS

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647416333437{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column]

    Curriculum: Digital Marketing Course in Delhi

    Digital Marketing Course starting with 12 Essential modules. Post that they can get specialization in Search Engine Optimization, Online advertising, and Social Media Marketing by Creating a Capstone Project For Each Specialization. We also offer 2 Mastery Modules of Digital Sales Optimization and Online Earning through Affiliate Marketing & Freelancing.

    Additionally, we also have 2 Mastery programs in Digital Sales Optimization, Online Earning through Affiliate Marketing and Freelancing. The training program is suitable for everyone, whether a Job Seeker, Entrepreneur, Working Professional or Business Owner.

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]
    Section 1: Marketing & Web Presence Foundation Modules (5 Modules)
    Section 2: Online Business Visibility Creation (6 Modules)
    SECTION 3: Lead Generation (5 Modules)
    SECTION 4: Lead Nurturing (4 Modules)
    SECTION 5: Personal Branding & Online Earning (4 Modules)
    SECTION 6: Interview Preparation (1 Modules )
    [vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1646035855637{margin-top: -25px !important;}”]
    Module 1: Marketing Foundation
    • History of Marketing
    • Traditional vs. Digital Marketing
    Module 2: Digital Marketing Ecosystem
    • The Current Opportunity
    • Digital Marketing Channels, Career & Consumer Journey
    Module 3: Digital Visibility Strategy
    • Website Planning
    • Local Visibility
    • Social Media Visibility
    Module 4: Online Lead Strategy
    • Need of Online Advertising & Types
    • Media Buying Principles
    • Nurturing & Lead Funnels
    Live-Tools Walkthrough: Google Forms, Survey Monkey, Google Drive, Google Advanced Search
    [/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]
    Learn how to make a business & its products more visible to online prospects
    Module 6: Graphic Designing For Business
    • Graphic Design Fundamentals
    • Designing- Marketing Kits
    • Designing Online Documents
    Module 7: Video Marketing For Business
    • Video Creation Strategy
    • Importance of Video Marketing
    • Types of Online Videos
    • Building Explainer Video Scripts
    • Live Exercise: Creating Explainer Videos
    • YouTube Marketing
    • Customizing Youtube Channel
    • Youtube Profile & Post Best Practices
    • Live Exercise: Youtube Customization & Upload
    Module 8: Building Your Business Website
    • Buying Domain & Hosting
    • Understanding C-panel
    • Installing WordPress
    • Customizing Theme
    • Building Home Page & Blog
    • Adding One Squeeze Page
    • Customizing Menu
    • Customization Practice & Doubt Session
    Module 9: Social Media Optimization For Business
    • Social Media Introduction
    • Exploring Different Social Media Networks
    • Optimizing Your Facebook Pages For Business
    • Optimizing Businesses Presence on Twitter
    • Linkedin Profile Optimization
    • Instagram Marketing
    Module 10: Search Engine Optimization
    • What is SEO
    • Keyword Selection & Mapping
    • Content Optimization
    • On-Page SEO & HTML Tag Optimization
    • Off-Page SEO & Link Building
    • Local SEO
    Module 11: Web Analytics & Traffic Reporting
    • Setting Up Google Analytics
    • Overview of Key GA Reports from Existing Data
    • Other Analytic Tools
    • Live Exercise: Analytics Report Audit
    Live-Tools Walkthrough:
    Canva, Youtube, Raw Shorts, Biteable, WordPress, SEO Power Suite, SEMRush, Facebook, Google Trends, LinkedIn Ads, Instagram
    [/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]
    Module 12: Landing Page Optimization
    • Anatomy of Landing Page
    • Strategizing Landing Page-Live
    Module 13: Online Advertising & Google Ads
    • Introduction to Paid Marketing
    • Programmatic & Direct Ads
    • Introduction to Search Ads
    • Google Ads Search (PPC) Advertising
    • Search Campaign Best Practices
    Module 14: Display Advertising
    • Introduction to Display Advertising
    • Live Display Campaign Creation Overview
    Module 15: Video Advertising
    • Introduction to Video Advertising
    • Video Ad Campaign-Live Walkthrough
    Module 16: Facebook Advertising
    • Introduction to FB Ads- Lead Generation, Engagement, Website Visits Etc.
    • FB Ad Campaign Creation-Live Walkthrough
    • FB Ads Best Practices
    Live-Tools Walkthrough:
    Google Ads, Facebook Ads
    [/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]
    Module 17: Email Marketing
    • Importance of email marketing
    • How to write effective mails
    • Email Strategy Creation
    • Email Marketing Tool
    • Email reporting & analysis
    Module 18: Remarketing & Rebranding
    • Cookie vs Data-Based Remarketing
    • Setting Up Remarketing Pixel
    • Display Remarketing Campaign-Live Walkthrough
    • Search Remarketing Campaign-Live Walkthrough
    Module 19: Inbound Marketing
    • What is Inbound Marketing
    • How to Generate Content Ideas
    • Building Content Calendars
    • Content Repurposing
    Module 20: Web Content Writing
    • Content Writing Essentials & Tools
    • Content Writing For Business Websites
    • Content Writing For Ecommerce Websites
    • Copywriting vs. Content Writing
    Live-Tools Walkthrough:
    Mailchimp, Leadsquared, Google Remarketing, Facebook Remarketing
    [/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]
    Module 21: E-commerce & Marketplace Marketing
    • E-commerce on Social Media Platforms
    • Setting Up Your E-commerce Store
    • Selling on Marketplaces
    • E-commerce Store Marketing
    Module 22: Personal Branding & Influencer Marketing
    • What is Personal Branding & Influencer Marketing
    • Key Personal Branding Platforms
    • Personal Branding 60 Days Roadmap
    • Making Money with Digital Products
    Module 23: Affiliate Marketing & Google Adsense
    • Introduction to Online Money Making
    • Introduction to Affiliate Networks & Payment Models
    • Signing up for Affiliate Programs
    • Selecting an Offer
    • Earning With Google Adsense
    Module 24: Earning As A Digital Marketing Freelancer
    • Freelancing Platforms
    • Building Freelancing Profile
    • Live Walkthrough: How to Grab Projects
    • How to Price your Services
    [/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]Get yourself prepared to apply for digital marketing jobs Module 25: Interview Process & Preparation
      • Placement Process Introduction
      • Understanding your Career Path
      • Ensuring your Skill Proficiency
      • How a Great CV Looks Like
      • Live Exercise: Creating Customized Cover Letters
      • Mock Interviews
    [/vc_column_text]
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647416404097{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #2a50a3 !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

    Digiperform Reviews: What our Trainees Say about Us?

    Our Courses have Been Receiving an average rating of 9.4/10 from our course participants. Till date, Digiperform has trained more than 24,000+ individuals.

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” pix_visibility=”1″ css=”.vc_custom_1646133134777{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H3vgxrm1DWw” align=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sk3r2AYgBRc” align=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column content_align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10″]
    SEND ME A BROCHURE
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” css=”.vc_custom_1646050705150{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

    100% Placement Assistance by Digiperform

    Our Placement cell is divided into Head Office and Zonal Teams to ensure we are able to find and offer region wise job and internship opportunities for candidates.

    We have a team of enthusiastic members, responsible for interfacing with the organization and assisting thousands of students in securing the best placements.

    [vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1590013670502{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ content_align=”text-center”]
    IN-COURSE INTERNSHIP
    Paid internships to learn from professionals and gain meaningful, hands-on experience.
    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
    MOCK INTERVIEW
    Mock interview sessions from experts to help you prepared for the final interview.
    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
    CAMPUS DRIVE
    Campus Drive Placements by partnering with the 1200+ hiring partners across the nation.
    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1590013670502{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ content_align=”text-center”]
    LMS JOBS
    In-house feature to apply for jobs and start a career with your first Digital Marketing job.
    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
    RESUME BUILDING
    Complete guidance to build your professional resume to catch the attention of recruiters.
    [/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
    LIVE PRACTICAL SESSIONS
    Digiperform provides live training sessions and helped students to understand the concepts.
    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
    [vc_single_image image=”33470″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column]

    Centers in Delhi

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column width=”1/5″]
    Shivalik
    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″]
    Rajouri Garden
    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″]
    Connaught Place
    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″]
    Pitampura
    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/5″]
    Kailash Colony
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” top_divider_select=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1646051126693{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_row pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_mt“:“-20px“}”][vc_column]

    FAQ: Digital Marketing Course

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” css=”.vc_custom_1647936065073{padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1559101053478{padding: 30px !important;}”]
    [vc_column_text]The duration of the course will be depending upon the course type you will choose. We have various courses with different duration. Planner- 6-8 Weeks Practitioner- 10-12 Weeks Professional- 18-20 Weeks[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]We have 5 centers in Delhi, which are located in Shivalik Kailash Colony Pitampura Rajouri Garden Connaught Place And you can visit the nearest branch to get information related to digital marketing.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]Digital Marketing professionals are in high demand as the domain is growing at a huge double-digit rate. And the capital of the country Delhi is also experiencing the flow of digitization. All the major Job Portals are flooded with Job openings in Digital Marketing Domain in Delhi Region, be it for a fresher or experienced professional there are vacancies available for all.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]Digiperform is the largest digital domain-specific training provider. its headquarter is based in Noida, Digiperform is making its wonderful presence through its 40+ centers all over India. At Digiperform, we have the top industry experts/trainers who support each and every student to achieve excellence in all parameters such as SEO, PPC, Social media marketing, Email- marketing, Google Ads, Affiliate marketing, etc and to meet their desired career goals.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]Delhi has immense potential for digital marketers. There are more than 100 Big & Small Digital Marketing Agencies located in the region looking for talent from time to time. In addition to that are multiple manufacturing industries, export houses, and multinational companies located in this region that are upgrading themselves to digital and required resources trained with skills like SEO, Social Media, online advertising, email marketing, etc. Marketing Professionals: Upskilling Professionals in other Roles: Upskilling, Career Shift, Freelancing Business Owners & Entrepreneurs: Promote Business, Manage Agency Digital Marketing Professionals: Career Growth Students & Freshers: Job, Freelancing[/vc_column_text]
    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
    [vc_column_text]Presently, the Digital marketing industry is booming with lots of career and job opportunities like 1. Digital Marketing Manager 2. Digital Marketing Executive 3. SEO Manager 4. Social Media Manager, and more. Businesses have started investing more in digital media. Consequently, there is a huge demand for skilled digital marketers to boost their online presence. So, certainly, the future in the digital industry is really bright.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]Digiperform offers 3 major digital marketing training programs in Delhi, which are – Planner, Practitioner, and Professional. The digital marketing course fee will be depending upon the training program you will choose.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]In the current competitive world, everybody requires a secured job and a great future. And Digiperform as a Digital marketing institute offers 100% job assistance to their students. Since 2014, 24,000+ Digiperformers got a placement with Digiperform Certifications in top brands such as Accenture, Adobe, Microsoft, Infibeam, Jaypee across Asia.[/vc_column_text]
    [vc_column_text]The average salary for a digital marketer starts from 3 lacs and goes up to 18 lacs, depending upon your knowledge, position, and experience.[/vc_column_text]
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” pix_over_visibility=”” bottom_divider_select=”8″ b_has_animation=”true” b_2_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.01)” b_3_is_gradient=”true” b_3_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.08)” b_3_color_2=”rgba(255,255,255,0.01)” b_3_animation=”fade-in-up” top_divider_select=”8″ t_has_animation=”true” t_1_color=”rgba(152,214,98,0.01)” t_2_color=”” t_3_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.1)” t_3_animation=”fade-in-down” t_flip_h=”true” pix_overlay_color=”gray-1″ responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_pt“:“20“,“pix_res_sm_pb“:“20“,“pix_res_md_pt“:“40“,“pix_res_md_pb“:“40“}” css=”.vc_custom_1613618080432{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}” t_custom_height=”200px” b_custom_height=”300px” pix_overlay_opacity=”1″ b_3_delay=”300″ t_3_delay=”150″][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” pix_particles_check=”” responsive_css=”{“pix_res_sm_pt“:“40“,“pix_res_sm_pb“:“40“,“pix_res_md_pt“:“40“,“pix_res_md_pb“:“40“}” css=”.vc_custom_1613618221329{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1613618065669{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”]
    Contact us today

    A-20, Kailash Colony, Hotel Conclave Complex, New Delhi, Delhi 110048 India

    +91- 818-181-7462, +91- 782-715-374

    [/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
    [vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_” css=”.vc_custom_1647935940961{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
